timer.title: Timer (minutes)
timer.intervalNote: Number of work sessions before a long break

Metadata.defaultDescription: Boost your productivity with Iteract, a simple and interactive Pomodoro timer and task management app.
Metadata.homeDescription: Start focusing now with the Iteract Pomodoro timer. Manage your tasks and track your progress effectively.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content:
This website uses Google Analytics to improve user experience.
 For more details, please see <link>How Google uses information from sites or apps that use our services</link>.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.content:
Thank you for using our service.
 For feedback and inquiries, please contact us via direct message on X (formerly Twitter).
 We welcome any bug reports, feature requests, etc.
